import React from 'react' import BlogInfo from './Bloginfo' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Blog = ({ blog, handleRemoval, handleLikes }) => { const blogStyle = { paddingTop: 10, paddingLeft: 2, border: 'solid', borderWidth: 1, marginBottom: 5 } return(
{blog.title} } />
) } export default Blog
